General.Name: Sylla Gold Corp.
General.Description: Sylla Gold Corp., a junior gold exploration company, focuses on the exploration and acquisition of gold properties in West Africa. The company focuses on the Niaouleni Gold Project that consists of 4 permits covering 17,200 hectares located in the Koulikoro region of southwest Mali, West Africa. The company was formerly known as Atlantic Industrial Minerals Incorporated and changed its name to Sylla Gold Corp. in April 2021. Sylla Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bedford, Canada.
General.Address: Sun Tower, Bedford, NS, Canada, B4A 1E6
